Add a 'release' profile with maven-gpg-plugin configuration to sign the deployed artifacts. Usage: "mvn deploy -P release".  The plugin will prompt for your passphrase, or you can supply it on the command line with -Dgpg.passphrase="..." or as a property in settings.xml. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/tiles/framework/trunk@516763 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
